definition: to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip
"walk slowly" component in Chinese characters/see also 冬字頭|冬字头[dong1 zi4 tou2]
preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
to possess/to have/equipped with/able to fulfill (conditions or requirements)
prepared against war/to prepare for war/warmongering
faultless/complete/perfect/to leave nothing to be desired

sentences.english: Buttermilk is added to soups and certain cheeses ;
sentences.chinese: 白脱牛奶备添加在汤或干酪里面。

sentences.english: The libraries subscribed to more than 8622 titles of local and overseas newspapers and periodicals.
sentences.chinese: 图书馆并购备了逾8622份本港及海外报章和期刊。

sentences.english: In the morning, I get a board cup at lobby and prepare some water from there for my class.
sentences.chinese: 早晨，我从大厅拿到了一个的纸杯备了些水去教室。

sentences.english: Preparing a lecture or drafting a textbook chapter reveals holes in your understanding.
sentences.chinese: 备一堂课，写一章草稿，它们都能暴露你思想的漏洞。

sentences.english: Objective To study on quality of decoction extracted by normal and high pressure Chinese Materia Medica (CMM) extructor.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察常压与高压煎药机制备中药汤剂的质量优劣。

sentences.english: Nung-fu order hay to deliver for the rainy season.
sentences.chinese: 农夫订了干草送货备雨季需用。

sentences.english: Studies the pricing of covered warrants on correlation between returns and volatility.
sentences.chinese: 研究标的股票收益与波动率相关下的备兑权证定价。

sentences.english: Karen placed fraud alerts with the credit reporting agencies.
sentences.chinese: 凯伦在信用报告机构备了案。

sentences.english: He can whip up a delicious dinner in half the time it takes another man.
sentences.chinese: 他能用别人的一半时间备一席美味的酒宴。

sentences.english: Also of note in their own weeks, the book can not be prepared in other countries are often inaccurate.
sentences.chinese: 又各以其本国周悉，书别国并不能备，亦往往失实。

sentences.english: Well, I'm sure I don't know, darling. Luck favors the prepared.
sentences.chinese: 哦，我也不知道亲爱的，有备才能无患啦。

sentences.english: These might be candidates for optimized resources or processing.
sentences.chinese: 这些可能会是优化资源或处理的备选项。

sentences.english: We have passed it on to our Technical Department for their consideration.
sentences.chinese: 我们已把该信转给了技术部，备他们考虑。

sentences.english: Firstly, the thesis researches the principal theory of covered warrant and risks.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先研究了备兑权证的基本理论及其风险。

sentences.english: Set up safety inventory in CHK plant for the common parts.
sentences.chinese: 为研发所用的常规料件备安全库存。

sentences.english: Then I got about the kitchen preparing four dishes and one soup.
sentences.chinese: 我连忙下厨，备了四菜一汤。

definition: Wanquan county in Zhangjiakou 張家口|张家口[Zhang1 jia1 kou3], Hebei
to prepare/to arrange (sth to be offered)
a possible period of want or need
to provide (items for an event)/to cater/to make preparations
to guard against the unexpected (idiom); just in case/prepared for any eventualities
Preparedness averts peril./to be prepared, just in case (idiom)
